title: Is there a way to get firefighter trist without buying the EU LCS bundle?
body: just wanna make sure if there is.

replies.body:
Hey TotesOnSteam,

There currently isn't another way to obtain the skin. You'd need to purchase the bundle. Firefighter Tristana is a Legacy skin, which means she'll periodically come out of the Legacy Vault. In that case, she'd be available without needing to purchase a bundle.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=bBOJ3sOE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-04T17:17:57.237+0000)
>
> Hey TotesOnSteam,
> 
> There currently isn't another way to obtain the skin. You'd need to purchase the bundle. Firefighter Tristana is a Legacy skin, which means she'll periodically come out of the Legacy Vault. In that case, she'd be available without needing to purchase a bundle.

Question: WHY is she still legacy? I thought the intent of legacy skins was to retire old, bad quality, out-dated skins.

Firefighter Tristana got completely VU'd when Tristana got VU'd. It is now a high quality skin that should be in the store.
We've never brought a skin out of retirement before. It's something I'd like to consider though.

> [{quoted}](name=WizardCrab,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=bBOJ3sOE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-08T21:25:24.176+0000)
>
> We've never brought a skin out of retirement before. It's something I'd like to consider though.

That's the point though - it's not the same skin anymore. It's new. It's updated. It shouldn't be retired.

I hope you guys fix this lol.
